alert.note: Alert for Boyd; Brown; Cherry; Holt; Keya Paha; Rock (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 2:46AM CDT until July 12 at 3:30AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Cherry County in north central Nebraska... Northern Rock County in north central Nebraska... Northern Brown County in north central Nebraska... Northwestern Holt County in north central Nebraska... Keya Paha County in north central Nebraska... Western Boyd County in north central Nebraska... * Until 330 AM CDT. * At 245 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Wewela to 9 miles southwest of Johnstown, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Ainsworth, Bassett, Springview, Long Pine, Newport, Naper, Johnstown, Norden, Wood Lake, Dustin, Burton, Hofeld Lake, Nets Peak, Bobcat State Wildlife Management Area, Meadville, North River Trail, Keller Park State Recreation Area, Thomas Creek State Wildlife Management Area, Mariaville and Pine Glen State Wildlife Refuge. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 170 and 225. Highway 20 between mile markers 217 and 270. Highway 12 between mile markers 25 and 108. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This is a DANGEROUS SITUATION. These storms are producing widespread wind damage across the warned area. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows!

area.areaDesc: Boyd; Brown; Cherry; Holt; Keya Paha; Rock
